message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value of this product.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $850,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to go up to $875,000, but no higher.
